body_html:
Glad to see you were able to find a solution.

Your resource exhausted error may have been due to opening too many files at once and running out of file descriptors. Supervisor has multiple threads doing things concurrently and can cause such issues due to unlucky timing. This is one problem that MonitoredSession/MonitoredTrainingSession were designed to solve -- everything is done in one thread there.

Long time spent in Dequeue is caused by Enqueue part being too slow. If you add time.sleep this masks the symptom, but doesn't solve underlying problem.

This is one problem that MonitoredSession/MonitoredTrainingSession were designed to solve -- everything is done in one thread there.
Long time spent in Dequeue is caused by Enqueue part being too slow. If you add time.sleep this masks the symptom, but doesn't solve underlying problem.
body:
Glad to see you were able to find a solution.

Your resource exhausted error may have been due to opening too many files at once and running out of file descriptors. Supervisor has multiple threads doing things concurrently and can cause such issues due to unlucky timing. This is one problem that MonitoredSession/MonitoredTrainingSession were designed to solve -- everything is done in one thread there.

Long time spent in Dequeue is caused by Enqueue part being too slow. If you add `time.sleep` this masks the symptom, but doesn't solve underlying problem.
